sys_hub_flow.description: The purpose of the flow is to automate the steps of an order. With each new order (Pending approval), the flow should request approval from any member of the "Supervisors" group. Supervisors can either approve (Approved) or disapprove (Disapproved) an order. When the "Delivery" field in the order form is checked, the flow should be terminated, also reflecting in the order status (Completed).

sys_hub_flow_snapshot.description: The purpose of the flow is to automate the steps of an order. With each new order (Pending approval), the flow should request approval from any member of the "Supervisors" group. Supervisors can either approve (Approved) or disapprove (Disapproved) an order. When the "Delivery" field in the order form is checked, the flow should be terminated, also reflecting in the order status (Completed).
